Articles.Content:
Meet the all-new MU MT-24!

This state-of-the-art Cargo VTOL is ready to help build colonies, carry out airdrops, and support massive (doomed) land invasions!

Features include a large cargo bay for rovers/passengers, quad VTOL engine nacelles (with RAPIERS for horizontal flight), and a crash-resistant cockpit section!

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Flight Instructions:

Throttle up to a notch or two under full throttle, and then engage the VTOL jets (do not adjust the thrust limiters!). Once they spool up, the dropship will achieve vertical takeoff, and you can begin flying! To turn, you'll want to bank the craft left and right while rotating it gently to adjust the direction the VTOL engines are thrusting. To land, throttle down enough to begin falling, and use the engines to slowly come in for a safe landing. (The emergency chutes are there to help with this if need be!) Cargo should be loaded onboard via a ramp or the SPH, and should be lashed down with struts (for KAS users/loading cargo in the SPH) and affixed via the medium docking port in the front of the bay.

/Action Groups:/

Abort- Opens emergency parachutes.

1- Toggles RAPIERS

2- Switches RAPIER engine mode (afterburners on/off)

3- Toggles VTOL Jets

4- //Blank//

5- Toggles Cargo Hold lighting.

Gear (G)- Toggles Landing legs.

Download:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/k64bhax7e0phlex/MU%20MT-24.craft?dl=0

This might get a BDArmory/Stock weapon equipped variant. I'll have to see...
